channel.title: 562 Login Screen? CHANGED? Please Help Me?
channel.description: I Am trying to change the login message on the source PkzEvolution when you login it says "Welcome To PkzEvolution" I dont want it to say his server i have his server source somewhere eles. and i am tyring to make it say my server instead can someon tell me how to fix this please help me out. Thank You Ahead of time.

open up your source and go to data > scripts, then open up authentication.py with notepad and it should be there.

Open your clientfiles and open ZFileSearcher and when it comes up type in “Welcome To PKzEvolution” and when it does go to the file that has it do CTRL+F and put in “Welcome To PKzEvolution” and remove it
